blog.name: flabbergasted-potato-skin
blog.title: All The Colors Of The Rainbow

summary:
MissSansLee
        |
        Archive of Our Own
body:
She doesn’t heal like I do.

Snowflakes sparkle under the light of the lamp post. Most of the people are tucked away in their houses and apartments. The street is void of almost all activity. Almost.

A young teen shakes against the violent wind. Puffs of white steam push past his pale, chapped lips. He’s only wearing a pair of thin pajama pants and a short sleeve t-shirt. Both articles are stained with deep crimson. His eyes are glazed over with tears as his red hands swipe them away. His brown curls are damp from the thick flakes of snow.

“Just a little further.” He whispers to himself.

‘I should have brought a jacket. I should have eaten dinner. I shouldn’t have yelled. I should have done what I was told. I should have…’

His teeth clicked violently against each other. “Just a little further.” His voice is lost in the wind. The snow in his shoes have long since turned to ice, scraping his sockless feet. The lights of the tower make his knees buckle. He can’t believe he’s just a block away. He wants to run to the front doors, to the light, the warmth and th embrace of his close friend.

His fingers can’t wrap around the door handle when he gets to it. A new wave of tears fell as he willed them to grasp the handle enough to grab the metal. He holds back a sob as he finally stumbles into the lobby. The woman at the front desk eyes the teen as she picks up the ringing phone. He lifts a shaky hand to show her his badge. She nods to the elevator, never taking her eyes off his small form.

“Hello, Peter. Would you like me to take you to Tony?” The sweet voice of the AI makes the boy jump.

“Y-yes, pl-please” He manages through his still chattering teeth. He manages to bite the tip of his tongue, but it goes unnoticed as he grips the wall of the elevator. His once snow covered pajamas are now soaked along with his hair, making him shiver harder.

The doors open at Tony’s private floor. Peter pushes himself forward until he finds his mentor in the large living area. “Hey, Pete-Oh my god.”

A/n: Hey! This is the series/fanfiction I’ve been working on. It’s posted in AO3 so if you want to read in tap the link below.

MissSansLee | Archive of Our Own

blog.name: waspwidow
blog.title: with great power comes no future
blog.description: i used to have nothing. and then i got this job...this family. and it made me better. and now they're gone, and i'm still trying to be better. - eliza, she/they, icon by bigstarkenergy.

summary:
there's a building and a broken helmet, side by side.
the building is sleek glass and bright tech, busy and thriving, a center...
body:
there’s a building and a broken helmet, side by side.

the building is sleek glass and bright tech, busy and thriving, a center for all the young prodigies of the world, helping the next generation of shining stars.

it’s a legacy that will never be forgotten, one better than the man it honors ever thought he’d get.

the helmet sits on a concrete pedastal, silent and staring, free for the taking, but always untouched, waiting for the day it is repaired or cast aside.

there are words on a plaque below it, but no one ever reads them, staring up at the hollow machine, the reminder of a hero long since dead but still so loved, so very loved.

it disappears one night, snatched by a masked thief.

there is shock, disbelief-and, surprisingly, no official case to get it back.

pepper potts only smiles slightly when asked where it has gone, never gives a formal reply.

a few days later, it comes back again, patched back together, the metal polished and shining.

whenever it breaks down, from weather or battle or anything in between, it’s always patched back up.

it always comes back home.

(its creator never did.)

blog.name: agdistis-sanctified
blog.title: Best Tab You Have Open
blog.description:
Deadpool Discord Server Here

[The artist formerly known as prince quirkyiceheart]

"If the egg's shell does not break... the chick will die without being born. We are the chick; the egg is the world. If the world's shell does not break, we will die without being born. Break the world's shell! For the sake of revolutionizing the world!"

Welcome! I'm Jordan. Expect a great deal of Tokyo Ghoul, Pandora Hearts, Marvel, other assorted fandoms Deadpool, bad jokes, some social justice (re)blogging, and very little original content. Compete for the firstborn child I'll never have by sending me head canons about my fictional favorites. Beware: new or even briefly reminisced-on fandoms become mighty dash tsunamis, tempered only by the queue feature.

Hobbies:
• Messaging YOU
• Low efforting my high ambitions
• Obsessing over books, anime, manga, comics, video games, tv shows, movies, and that one musical
• Leeching off of the illicit, dank memes of others
• Hoping my social inhibitions won't butcher my dreams
• Learning literally any new or novel information
• Debating (Fight me. Nothing's too taboo.)
• Staring at fruit fly butts (It's my job.)

Pansexual • Polyamorous • Gray-Aromantic • Polygender/Enby • They/Them/Whatever • Professional Conversation Dropper • Social Justice Red Mage • Chimichangette • Vegan • Fuckin' Nerd • Unapologetic Weeb • Pessimistic Leftie-Anarchist • Agnostic-Atheist • Pastafarian • Ordained Dudeist Priest • Lord of Sealand • INTP • Ravenclaw / Slytherin • Determinist • Materialist • Pretentious Wannabe • Half-Centaur • Extinctionist • Rat Parent • Just a Big Fan of Rats and Mushrooms • Neuroscience Student • Animal Exploitation Abolitionist • Residing in Providence, Midgard 616 • Montana Native • Tetris Grandmaster • Couch Potato

MyAnimeList
Pinterest
Ask if you want to add me on Facebook!

Recommended Tags for Blacklisting:
• Personal (Only about me/my life)
• NSFW (Nudity; overt sexuality or vulgarity)
• Blood (Basic bloody images)
• Violence (Stabbing, limb loss, etc.)
• Gore (Visible viscera; graphic violence)
• Rape (Any explicit reference to it)
• Child Abuse (Any explicit reference to it)
• Animal Abuse (Any explicit reference to it)
• Long Post (Up to my discretion)
• Long Ass Post (Even longer posts)
• [x] Spoilers (e.g. "Tokyo Ghoul Spoilers")
• [Season#xEp#] Spoilers (e.g. "1x01 Spoilers")
• Chapter [#] Spoilers (e.g. "Chapter 3 Spoilers")
• [Insert Fandom Name Here]
• [Insert Ship Name Here]
• [Insert Character Name Here]
• Message me to request a new tag!

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

"Looked at sky through smoke heavy with human fat and God was not there. The cold, suffocating dark goes on forever and we are alone. Live our lives, lacking anything better to do. Devise reason later. Born from oblivion; bear children, hell-bound as ourselves, go into oblivion. There is nothing else. Existence is random. Has no pattern save what we imagine after staring at it for too long. No meaning save what we choose to impose. This rudderless world is not shaped by vague metaphysical forces. It is not God who kills the children. Not fate that butchers them or destiny that feeds them to the dogs. It’s us. Only us. Streets stank of fire. The void breathed hard on my heart, turning its illusions to ice, shattering them. Was reborn then, free to scrawl own design on this morally blank world."
- - - Rorschach; Watchmen by Alan Moore

summary: Spending our nights awake Silent for both our sake Hold me until I'm strong Cause I'll miss this when you're gone And they say...
caption:
Spending our nights awake
Silent for both our sake
Hold me until I’m strong
Cause I’ll miss this when you’re gone

And they say that it goes so I hope that it shows
You are all that I’ve known for a while
And I’m coming up slow and I’m thinking of home
But you’re all that I’ve known for a while

For A While - Fenne Lily

I’m very pro Iron Man, so don’t come at me with that Captain Hypocrite shit.

I sometimes post rants about Anti Team Cap.

Just give me some unappreciated recs please! 💩

body:
me: I really admire Tony Stark because he’s openly flawed and I agree with his side of the civil war.

Random Team Cap stan: lmao Tony Stark is a monster, the Accords are fucking bullshit, and I hope he dies.

summary: Iron Man; Vol 1, 170 Bronze Age Comic Book.  NM- (9.2).  May 1983.  Marvel Comics
title: Iron Man; Vol 1, 170 Bronze Age Comic Book.  NM- (9.2).  May 1983.  Marvel Comics
excerpt: Iron Man 175 is written by Dennis ONeil with cover and interior at by Luke McDonnel. This comic is a key issue, and the first time James Rhodes (War Machine) donned the Iron Man armor after Tony Starks alcoholism gets the best of him, and he is too drunk to don the armor. James would become Iron for

summary: Image Description:[[MORE]] Tony Stark (portrayed by Robert Downey Jr) is standing next to Peter Parker (portrayed by Tom...
caption:
Image Description:

Tony Stark (portrayed by Robert Downey Jr) is standing next to Peter Parker (portrayed by Tom Holland). Tony has his hand on Peter’s shoulder and both have expressions which could either be confusion or concern.

Text reads:
(678): You left me a really long voicemail saying, “Hey, it’s meeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee.” and the rest is just loud laughter

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: An Earthquake, A Blizzard and A Storm
title: An Earthquake, A Blizzard and A Storm
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Fyupms

by Reshma

“Why didn’t you just tell me? You were supposed to trust me.” Tony’s eyes are hard and ablaze with anger but there’s something in his voice that just sounds bewildered and just sad; it’s a few gasping breaths away from almost desperate, possibly.

Peter scoffs and lets out a humorless laugh, “Yeah, well, we both know how that ended up last time.”

Words: 3788, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Other
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man), Ben Parker, Ned Leeds, Michelle Jones, Adrian Toomes, Liz Allan, Richard Parker, Mary Parker, Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker, Ben Parker & May Parker (Spider-Man)
  • Additional Tags: Parent Tony Stark, Loss of Parent(s), References to Depression, Irondad, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, May Parker (Spider-Man) Needs a Hug, Angst, Heavy Angst, Grief/Mourning, Father-Son Relationship, Authority Figures, Peter Parker Has Issues, What Have I Done, Mention of Avengers, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Not Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie) Compliant, Not Canon Compliant


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Fyupms

by Reshma

“Why didn’t you just tell me? You were supposed to trust me.” Tony’s eyes are hard and ablaze with anger but there’s something in his voice that just sounds bewildered and just sad; it’s a few gasping breaths away from almost desperate, possibly.

Peter scoffs and lets out a humorless laugh, “Yeah, well, we both know how that ended up last time.”

blog.title: Best Tab You Have Open
blog.description:
Deadpool Discord Server Here

[The artist formerly known as prince quirkyiceheart]

"If the egg's shell does not break... the chick will die without being born. We are the chick; the egg is the world. If the world's shell does not break, we will die without being born. Break the world's shell! For the sake of revolutionizing the world!"

Welcome! I'm Jordan. Expect a great deal of Tokyo Ghoul, Pandora Hearts, Marvel, other assorted fandoms Deadpool, bad jokes, some social justice (re)blogging, and very little original content. Compete for the firstborn child I'll never have by sending me head canons about my fictional favorites. Beware: new or even briefly reminisced-on fandoms become mighty dash tsunamis, tempered only by the queue feature.

Hobbies:
• Messaging YOU
• Low efforting my high ambitions
• Obsessing over books, anime, manga, comics, video games, tv shows, movies, and that one musical
• Leeching off of the illicit, dank memes of others
• Hoping my social inhibitions won't butcher my dreams
• Learning literally any new or novel information
• Debating (Fight me. Nothing's too taboo.)
• Staring at fruit fly butts (It's my job.)

Pansexual • Polyamorous • Gray-Aromantic • Polygender/Enby • They/Them/Whatever • Professional Conversation Dropper • Social Justice Red Mage • Chimichangette • Vegan • Fuckin' Nerd • Unapologetic Weeb • Pessimistic Leftie-Anarchist • Agnostic-Atheist • Pastafarian • Ordained Dudeist Priest • Lord of Sealand • INTP • Ravenclaw / Slytherin • Determinist • Materialist • Pretentious Wannabe • Half-Centaur • Extinctionist • Rat Parent • Just a Big Fan of Rats and Mushrooms • Neuroscience Student • Animal Exploitation Abolitionist • Residing in Providence, Midgard 616 • Montana Native • Tetris Grandmaster • Couch Potato

MyAnimeList
Pinterest
Ask if you want to add me on Facebook!

Recommended Tags for Blacklisting:
• Personal (Only about me/my life)
• NSFW (Nudity; overt sexuality or vulgarity)
• Blood (Basic bloody images)
• Violence (Stabbing, limb loss, etc.)
• Gore (Visible viscera; graphic violence)
• Rape (Any explicit reference to it)
• Child Abuse (Any explicit reference to it)
• Animal Abuse (Any explicit reference to it)
• Long Post (Up to my discretion)
• Long Ass Post (Even longer posts)
• [x] Spoilers (e.g. "Tokyo Ghoul Spoilers")
• [Season#xEp#] Spoilers (e.g. "1x01 Spoilers")
• Chapter [#] Spoilers (e.g. "Chapter 3 Spoilers")
• [Insert Fandom Name Here]
• [Insert Ship Name Here]
• [Insert Character Name Here]
• Message me to request a new tag!

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

"Looked at sky through smoke heavy with human fat and God was not there. The cold, suffocating dark goes on forever and we are alone. Live our lives, lacking anything better to do. Devise reason later. Born from oblivion; bear children, hell-bound as ourselves, go into oblivion. There is nothing else. Existence is random. Has no pattern save what we imagine after staring at it for too long. No meaning save what we choose to impose. This rudderless world is not shaped by vague metaphysical forces. It is not God who kills the children. Not fate that butchers them or destiny that feeds them to the dogs. It’s us. Only us. Streets stank of fire. The void breathed hard on my heart, turning its illusions to ice, shattering them. Was reborn then, free to scrawl own design on this morally blank world."
- - - Rorschach; Watchmen by Alan Moore

summary: So I have this thought...
body:
So I have this thought…

So, in the MCU we constantly see Tony Stark survive things that otherwise should have killed him. For example: open heart surgery without anesthetic in a cave, palladium poisoning, flying a nuke into space, multiple crushes and contusions in fights, years of alcoholism ,etc…

So, what if Tony isn’t 100% a normal human. His (asshat) father was Howard Stark who fricken WORKED on Project Rebirth. He had some knowledge of the super soldier serum. What, if while trying to remake the serum, Howard used little baby Tony as a test subject. That would explain how Tony has survived through some of the worst experiences and it would tie into Howard’s line of “My greatest creation is you” in IM2.

Just a thought

*edit* 1) HOLY SHIT THIS HAS A LOT OF NOTES! Nothing I ever post here gets this much attention so thank you all. 2) I I will that our sweet boy is 100% human cinnamon roll. I know that. I just posted this as a think peice and something for people to add into a fan fic.
